error.offline: The backend is currently offline! Please contact @SUPPORT if the problem persists.
error.internal: An internal error occured. Please contact @SUPPORT if the problem persists.
error.internal_db: An internal database error occured. Please contact @SUPPORT if the problem persists.
error.plugin: An application specific error occured. Please contact the application developer or @SUPPORT if the problem persists.
error.noconsent: No active consent that allows to add data for target person.
error.notrialuser_detail: In order to use this feature you need to complete your registration. Request a written copy of the General Terms and Conditions and send it signed back to @OPERATOR. You will also receive a confirmation code to verify your postal address. If you want to check your account status click on your username on the top right and check the 'Account Status' section.
error.mustbemember_detail: In order to use this feature you must be member of the cooperative. Click on your username on the top right and check the 'Account Status' section for more information.
error.ratelimit: The rate limit for the current action has been reached. Try again later.
error.no_code_challenge: Authorization endpoint called with insufficient parameters. Contact application developer.

postregister.email_code: For convenience you may enter the code from the email here:

postregister.code_done: You have provided the confirmation code. You may login after the signed contract has arrived at @OPERATOR.
postregister.email_success: Thank you for confirming your email address.
postregister.address_entered: Your postal address is required to use this service, please provide it.
postregister.phone_entered: A mobile phone number is required to use this service, please provide it.
postregister.birthday_entered: A valid birthdate is required to use this service. Please add your birthdate to your account information. (Format example: 31.12.1999)
postregister.gender_entered: Your gender must be provided to use this service. Please indicate your gender.
postregister.admin_verified: Your account must be unlocked by an administrator. Please retry later. If your account has not been unlocked for more than 24 hours, please contact @SUPPORT.
postregister.terms_agreed: The General Terms and Conditions have been updated. Please confirm that you have taken note of the new version.
postregister.privacy_policy_agreed: The Privacy Policy has been updated. Please confirm that you have taken note of the new version.

postregister.no_token: Please wait up to a minute for the code to arrive.
postregister.no_token_btn: I did not receive the code

postregister.auth2factorsetup2: You can change your settings later in your profile. Log into {{domain}} and click on your name on the top right.
postregister.auth_type_none: I do not want to use two factor authentication.
postregister.auth_type_sms: I want to use two factor authentication using SMS codes. Please send a code to my mobile phone at login.
postregister.emailnotify2: Please send me an email everytime I log into the @PRODUCT portal at {{domain}}.

keyrecovery.intro: The private key that is used to encrypt your data needs to be recovered. In order to recover your key, try one of these options:
keyrecovery.way1: Do you have any application using @PRODUCT where you are still logged in? If yes, open that application and your key will be recovered. Try to login again afterwards.
keyrecovery.way2: Have you logged in using a browser before? If yes try to log in using the same browser and device.
keyrecovery.way3: Remember your old password again? If yes try to log in using your old password.
keyrecovery.way4: Wait for @OPERATOR employees to do a manual key recovery. @OPERATOR will send you an email when the recovery has been done. Please wait up to five working days for the recovery to be completed.

licence.intro: A license is required to use this application.
licence.text: Please contact @SUPPORT to obtain a valid license.

reject.intro1: You have clicked on the account REJECTION link in the account confirmation mail.
reject.intro2: Please confirm that you do NOT want to create an account on @PLATFORM. Your email address will be blocked for further registration attempts until you contact @SUPPORT.
reject.intro3: If you clicked the wrong link and want to CONFIRM your email address instead, click here:

changepassphrase.title: Change Passphrase
changepassphrase.description: A passphrase is an additional protection (additional encryption) for your data. It is not stored on our servers. You have to provide the passphrase on every login, to make it possible to decrypt your data. If you loose your passphrase, you will not be able to access your data anymore!.
changepassphrase.if_unprotected: If your account is not yet protected by a passphrase leave the field 'Old passphrase' empty.
changepassphrase.keep_passphrase_safe: Please keep your passphrase at a save place, there is no recovery function for it. If you loose your passphrase, you will not be able to access your data anymore!.
changepassphrase.repeat_finalizes: By repeating your new passphrase you make the change final.

studydetails.retreat_help: You are currently participating to this research. If you no longer want to participate you may retreat from participation. Your shared data will be frozen at the moment of retreat and no new data will be shared. Once retreated you are not able to participate again.
studydetails.please_review2: Please review this research project. Do you want to participate? Click on 'Skip (No change)' if you want to leave this page without any changes.

consents.title: Consents
consents.description: Using consents you can grant others (health professionals, friends, researchers, ...) access to some of your data. Use this page to manage your consents and create new ones.

dashboard.mydata_text: Manage your health data. Enter new data and visualize existing data.
dashboard.social_text: Share your data with friends. Communicate with people sharing your health situation. Motivate yourself by competition with others.
dashboard.research_text: Participate in research projects. Inform yourself about current research.
dashboard.health_text: Share data with your doctor. Search for health professionals.
dashboard.newrecords_teaser: There are no new records. Visit the records page to browser all of your records.
dashboard.newsharedrecords_teaser: Other @PRODUCT account holders may share their data with you.
dashboard.circles_teaser: Ask others to add you to their circles.
dashboard.circles2_teaser: Create Circles to share your data with others. Share with friends, family or others.
dashboard.providers_teaser: Search for health professionals and add them to your list in order to share data with them.
dashboard.hcrecords: Newest records from your health professionals
dashboard.studies_teaser: If you want to participate in research, configure your research settings. You will be contacted in this tile if you match a projects requirements.
dashboard.researchnews_text: Search for new health research publications.

member_user.email_unvalidated: Your email address has not been validated yet. Please click on the link in the validation email you received!

accountwipe.title: Close and Delete @PRODUCT Account
accountwipe.paragraph1: You would like to delete your @PRODUCT account irrevocably? That is of course possible.
accountwipe.paragraph2: Please read the following information first:
accountwipe.point1: If you delete your @PRODUCT account your personal data will no longer be available.
accountwipe.point2: Data already included in research projects will continue to be available in these projects.
accountwipe.point3: @OPERATOR is not able to recover your deleted account.
accountwipe.paragraph3: If you really want to delete your @PRODUCT account enter your password for confirmation.
accountwipe.reason2: We would be grateful if you could tell us why you are deleting your account. We are continually trying to improve the @PLATFORM.
accountwipe.error: Password not correct. The account has not been deleted.

service.title: Token-Link service for @PRODUCT
service.success: Your token-link has been processed. You can now close this window.

serviceleave.title: You are leaving @PRODUCT
serviceleave.logoutreturn: You are now leaving the @PRODUCT account management portal.

ask.Subscription: Access and manage subscriptions to external systems

apikeys.title: API Key Management
apikeys.empty: This account does not manage any services with API keys.
apikeys.instructions: Please copy these keys somewhere safe. They are displayed only once.
apikeys.instructions_key: Use this key directly in the authorization header of the service as bearer token.
apikeys.instructions_refresh: For improved security, exchange this refresh token against a new pair of access token and refresh token.
apikeys.common_name: OU (organization unit) and CN (common name) for CSR (certificate request)
apikeys.instructions_common_name: For certificate based authentication create a CSR with the given OU and CN fields. Send the CSR to @SUPPORT

failure.title: Login not allowed
failure.intro: You are not allowed to log in for the following reason:
failure.withdrawn1: You have withdrawn your participation in a project. The participation is mandantory in order to use this application.
failure.withdrawn2: You will not be able to use the application again with your @PRODUCT account.
failure.joinmethod1: The access to the research project is restricted.
failure.joinmethod2: Please contact the team responsible for the project. For more information, read the terms of use of the application.
